GSP31jaymangu:6: prekṣāvanto 'nukte prayojane na kvacitpravartanta iti prayojanamucyate tattvajñānānmokṣaḥ tattvāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:9: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:41: kena khalvimāni duḥkhānyutpadyanta iti tadavaghātako heturjijñāsyo bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:43: sa ca pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānānnānya iti manasi vartate //
GSP31jaymangu:53: tataśca dṛṣṭe hetau sati jijñāsā 'smin viṣaye nirarthaketyāśaṅkyāha- 'naikāntātyantato 'bhāvāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:57: dṛṣṭe hyupāye kriyamāṇe 'pi keṣāṃcidduḥkhatrayaṃ bhavatyeveti naikāntenopaśamaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:76: iyanto devā asmin svarga iti jñātavantaḥ jñānamasmākamutpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:96: tathā cāhuḥ - 'bahūnīndrasahasrāṇi vyatītāni yuge yuge'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:100: tathāhi- yaḥ kratuśatena yajate tasya mahadaiśvaryam,
GSP31jaymangu:104: dṛṣṭānuśravikadvārā yo viparītaḥ tattvajñānākhyaḥ sa śreyān /
GSP31jaymangu:132: prakriyata utpadyate pradhānāt asyā iti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:140: mahān buddhissa ādyo yāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ tāstathoktāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:144: tanmātrāṇi śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca yathākramamākāśavāyvagnyudakapṛthivyākhyāni bhūtāni janayantaḥ prakṛtayaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:177: nanu cānyānyapi pratibhādīni pramāṇāni santi tadyathā-
GSP31jaymangu:183: tatra grāme nagare vā vartata iti pratibhotpannā /
GSP31jaymangu:191: tatra gavayamajānānaḥ kaścidāptaṃ pṛcchati 'kīdṛśo gavayaḥ', iti /
GSP31jaymangu:195: tadāpi gavi dṛṣṭenaiva viṣāṇādinā liṅgena gavayasya vyavahāraṃ pravartayatītyanumānameva na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP31jaymangu:206: 'māṣaḥ prastha ityukte catvāraḥ kuḍapā itīdamapi sambhavati';
GSP31jaymangu:210: 'devadatto divā na bhuṅkte balavāṃścetyukta arthādrātrau bhuṅkte';
GSP31jaymangu:212: tata eva rātrau tasya pratītiranumānānna bhidyate /
GSP31jaymangu:214: kiṃ pramāṇatrayalakṣaṇe prayojanamiti cedāha- 'prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇāddhi'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:230: śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu yathākramaṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇendriyadvāreṇa viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā yā buddhirutpadyate tad dṛṣṭam,
GSP31jaymangu:235: tatra dūrāt kvacidāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā devadattasārūpyaṃ vyapadiśati devadatto 'yamiti yā buddhirutpadyate tatsavikalpam,
GSP31jaymangu:259: kadācitkokilaṃ liṅginaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrāvyeṇāpi virutenāsya bhavitavyamiti tayorgamyagamakatvaṃ sati sambandhe /
GSP31jaymangu:260: sambandhāśca sapta- tatra svasvāmibhāvasambandho yathā rājapuruṣayoḥ kadācitpuruṣeṇa rājā rājñā vā puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:272: nirvairaḥ pūjitaḥ sadbhirāpto jñeyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:282: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kaḥ kasya viṣaya ityata āha-
GSP31jaymangu:333: sadṛśānāṃ rāśīkaraṇāt dhānyarāśau hyeko dhānyaguḍakaḥ prakṣipto na dṛśyate /
GSP31jaymangu:341: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtisarūpaṃ virūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31jaymangu:345: yathā ghaṭasyotpatteḥ prāk mṛt śarādiṣu.... tasya pradhvaṃsābhāvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:349: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tau sta iti gamyata ityāha- 'kāryatastadupalabdheḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:350: yadyapyatrobhayaṃ prakrāntaṃ tathāpi tacchabdena pradhānaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP31jaymangu:354: mahān buddhiḥ sa ādiryasya tanmahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ kāryamasti /
GSP31jaymangu:376: yadeva sat ghaṭādidravyaṃ tadeva mṛtpiṇḍādinā kāraṇaviśeṣeṇa kriyate, nāsat //
GSP31jaymangu:378: iha yadarthaṃ yadupādīyate tasya tadupādānaṃ kāraṇam,
GSP31jaymangu:381: atra tailaṃ dadhi ca yadi na syāt kathaṃ tasyopādānasya grahaṇaṃ tadarthibhiḥ kriyate /
GSP31jaymangu:385: yadyasatkāryaṃ bhavet tadā sarvasya sarvatra sambhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31jaymangu:395: evaṃ ca tacchakanīyaṃ yadi kāraṇe śaktirūpeṇāvasthitaṃ syāt /
GSP31jaymangu:399: yadyasatkāryamutpadyate kimiti kāraṇabhāvena kāryasya bhāvo bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:407: asatsvabhāvebhyo hyutpādyetetyevaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ sadevotpadyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 9 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:411: evaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ sadevotpadyata iti vyavasthāpya prakṛtevirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca darśayati /
GSP31jaymangu:450: yadyasmādutpannaṃ mahadādi vyaktaṃ tadeva tadāśritaṃ nānyat /
GSP31jaymangu:459: pralayakāle hyākāśādayaḥ pañca yathākramaṃ śabdāditanmātreṣu līyante,
GSP31jaymangu:472: yadasmādutpadyate tadevānuruddhya svakāryaṃ janayati na tadvyatirekeṇeti darśanārtham /
GSP31jaymangu:502: mahato 'ṅkāra ityādinā svakāryotpādanadharmatvādyathā vyaktāvyaktayorvairūpyaṃ sārūpyaṃ ca,
GSP31jaymangu:503: tathā kiṃ puruṣasya vāpītyāha- 'tadviparītastathā ca pumān'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:535: na kiṃcidanena liṅgyate na vāyaṃ kadācillīyate 'nutpannatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:565: ke ke trayo guṇāḥ kimātmakā ityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:569: prītyādaya ātmāno yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ te tathoktāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:578: kimiti te guṇāḥ parasparasavyapekṣāḥ kiṃ vā netyāha- 'anyo 'nyābhibhavāśrayajananamithunavṛttayaśca guṇāḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:598: tatra yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ tadā rajastamasī nyakkṛtaśaktike /
GSP31jaymangu:607: rajaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:610: itare tu tau eva pravṛttiṃ janayanta iti darśayannāha- anyo 'nyavṛttaya iti /
GSP31jaymangu:615: ) sitatvātsāttvikī sā bharttuḥ sukhamutpādayati sapatnīnāṃ kāsāṃcidduḥkhaṃ kāsāṃcidviṣādamityatra sattvamātmano dvayośca vṛttihetuḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:619: svāminaśca tuṣṭimityatra raja ātmano dvayosca vṛttihetuḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:621: tāmasāḥ, te varṣantaḥ proṣitabhartṛkāṇāṃ viṣādaṃ janayanti,
GSP31jaymangu:622: pathikānāṃ duḥkham kṛṣīvalānāṃ tuṣṭimityatra tama ātmano dvayośca vṛttihetuḥ // 12 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:627: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:631: iṣṭaṃ sāṃkhyācāryāṇāṃ sattvaṃ laghusvabhāvaṃ prakāśaṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:634: bāhyāni ca dravyāṇi laghūni prakāśātmakāni nirmalāni bhavanti //
GSP31jaymangu:653: nanu caite parasparavilakṣaṇā guṇā viruddhatvāt kathaṃ sambhūyaikatra vartanta ityāha- 'pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:657: tamasi sthitā ghaṭādayo devadattasya prakāśayitavyā iti,
GSP31jaymangu:663: nanu ca 'triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi vyaktam',
GSP31jaymangu:673: kathaṃ? yasmādguṇā evāvivekino bhogyāssāmānyā acetanā prasavadharmiṇaśca,
GSP31jaymangu:674: te ca vyakte siddhā iti siddho guṇaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:683: kāraṇasya yo guṇaḥ sa ātmā svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam /
GSP31jaymangu:686: śuklaiḥ kṛṣṇairvā tantubhirārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:697: kāryatastadupalabdhermahadādi tacca kāryamityanenaiva sādhite 'smin yathāvadadhigate punardārḍhyārthaṃ samanantaropādānam /
GSP31jaymangu:711: ya ekajātyanugatā bhedāsteṣāmekameva tathābhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31jaymangu:719: tataśca prāk ca pravṛtterjanitayā śaktyā bhavitavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:727: anyathā ghaṭāsyodakāharaṇakriyā yā na sā mṛtpiṇḍasya,
GSP31jaymangu:739: bāhyāni ca kāraṇāni pṛthivyā dhṛtisaṅgrahapattivyūhanāvakāśadānaiḥ parasparamupakurvanti /
GSP31jaymangu:746: yathādhyātmikānāṃ bāhyānāṃ copakāryopakārakabhāvo buddhikṛta iva dṛśyate tadasya kaścidvyavasthāpitā syāt,
GSP31jaymangu:759: pralayakāle vaiśvarūpyaṃ kva līyate sthityutpattipralayājjagata iti /
GSP31jaymangu:775: yadi kāraṇamastyavyaktaṃ tatkathaṃ pravartata ityāha- 'triguṇatassamudayācca'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:776: yadā prakṛtisthā guṇāssāmyena pravartante tadā (trīnevādhikṛtya pravarante naikaikamityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:781: yadi samudayādavyaktaṃ pravartate tasmādutpannaṃ tadavya...smānna bhavati //
GSP31jaymangu:782: śuklebhyaḥ kṛṣṇebhyo vā tantubhyaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā paṭo bhavatītyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:786: yathā kaṇikāyāḥ sūkṣmāyā mūlakaḥ śākhāpraśākhādipravṛddho mahānvanaspatirvyakto bhavati,
GSP31jaymangu:792: yathā salilamantarikṣādekarasamapi tadekasya kaṭvamlāderguṇasyāśrayabhūtasya viśeṣānnānārasaṃ vartate evamavyaktamapīti guṇātmakatvādekaikaguṇāśrayaviśeṣānnānārūpaṃ pravartate /
GSP31jaymangu:799: evamavyaktasyāstitvaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca prasādhya puruṣāstitvaṃ prasādhayitumāha-
GSP31jaymangu:806: iha loke saṃghātabāhyāḥ śayanāsanādayo ye te parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:807: te hi devadattasya parasyārthaṃ kurvanti na svārtham /
GSP31jaymangu:812: nanu mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ śarīrameva puruṣo nānyaḥ kaścidityatrāha- 'triguṇādiviparyayāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:819: mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ śarīramiha loke yadadhiṣṭhānaṃ tatparādhiṣṭhitaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP31jaymangu:833: yaśca bhoktā sa eva puruṣaḥ sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvāt /
GSP31jaymangu:842: tatra yadi puruṣo na syāttadā tadarthā pravṛttirna bhavet /
GSP31jaymangu:845: eka evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvaśarīreṣu sthita ityeke /
GSP31jaymangu:849: tasmādagnesa..viṣphuliṅgāḥ pratiśarīraṃ puruṣā ābirbhūtā iti vedāntavādinaḥ // 17 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:860: kutaḥ ? - nityatāt tatra yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāttadaikasmin jāyamāne mriyamāṇe vā sarveṣāṃ jananamaraṇe syātām /
GSP31jaymangu:876: tatra yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāttadaikasmin sāttvike rājase tāmase vā,
GSP31jaymangu:879: purāṇapuruṣādagneriva viṣphuliṅgāḥ pratiśarīraṃ puruṣā ityasminnapi darśane puruṣabahutvamastyeva /
GSP31jaymangu:880: teṣāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇatvāt te purāṇapuruṣādabhinnā bhinnā veti darśanadvayam /
GSP31jaymangu:889: yaḥ prāgukto viparyayaḥ- triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ - ityādinā,
GSP31jaymangu:895: paśyati śṛṇoti sarvama karoti sthitiṃ prasaṅgaṃ ca nāpi /
GSP31jaymangu:897: yaścodāsīnaḥ sa sākṣyapi bhavati pradhānasambandhinaḥ kriyākalāpasya nirguṇatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:899: nanu ca yadyakartā tatkathaṃ- bhoktṛbhāvādasti puruṣaḥ- ?
GSP31jaymangu:902: puruṣo 'pi viṣayaphalānāṃ svayamakṛtānāṃ tathāpi bhoktā // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:907: nanu ca yadyacetanamavyaktaṃ kathaṃ dehendriyasaṃjñamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmādharmādiṣu pravarttate,
GSP31jaymangu:912: tena puruṣeṇa yaḥ saṃyogastasmādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:915: yadi tadeva triguṇātmakaṃ kartṛ na pumān,
GSP31jaymangu:916: kathaṃ puruṣo gacchatītyucyata ityāha- 'guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:921: yathā svāmī svayamayoddhāpi yaudhabhṛtyasaṃyogād yoddheti vyapadiśyate,
GSP31jaymangu:941: dṛṣṭvā sa sarvāṃ vibhūtimanubhūya virasatvād viraktaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānena tyajyate /
GSP31jaymangu:942: tyaktasya kaivalyamityato darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ ca dvayorapi saṃyogo matsyodakavadudumbaramaśakaśca //
GSP31jaymangu:945: paṅguḥ sacakṣuḥ paśyati panthānaṃ na saṃcarati,
GSP31jaymangu:951: evaṃ puruṣo niṣkriyaḥ pradhānena saṃyujya tadvibhūtidarśanāya devādiṣu saṃcarati /
GSP31jaymangu:954: nanu ca saṃyogamātreṇa kathaṃ darśanaṃ kaivalyaṃ cetyāha- 'tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:963: prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇamavyaktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ tamobahulamavyākṛtamiti prakṛtiparyāyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:977: ṣoḍaśād gaṇādyāni pañca tanmātrāṇi tebhya ekottaravṛddhyā pañca mahābhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1029: īśitvaṃ prabhutā (yena sthāvarādīni bhūtāni sandeśakārīṇi bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1085: tatastaijasamahaṅkāraṃ kriyāśīlaṃ sahāyamapekṣyaikādaśakaṃ pañcakaṃ ca malājanayata (?) iti // 25 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:1119: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ ca svasvaviṣayagrahaṇakāle buddhīndriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1120: ubhayatrāpyasya vyāpārāditi lakṣaṇaṃ tadityāha- saṅkalpayatīti saṅkalpakam,
GSP31jaymangu:1132: ahaṅkārasthā ye guṇāḥ sattvādayasteṣāmanyo 'nyābhibhavāśrayā (dvidvāreṇa yaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣastata evaiṣāṃ nānātvam /
GSP31jaymangu:1137: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanāni śirasi bahiḥ pṛthak pṛthagavasthitāni bāhyavṛttīni /
GSP31jaymangu:1141: ye cānye viṣayabhedā deśaniyamavṛtiniyamābhyāṃ te 'pi guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣādeva /
GSP31jaymangu:1151: teṣu yathākramaṃ pañcānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāmālocanamātraṃ vṛttiriṣyate sāṃkhyācāryaiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1154: tathā hi buddhyavasitamarthaṃ puruṣaḥ cetayata iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1155: karmendriyāṇāmapi vāgādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ vasanādānādīni vṛttayaḥ karmāṇi /
GSP31jaymangu:1177: eṣāṃ ca buddhyādīnāṃ trayodaśānāṃ caturvidhā vṛttiḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1188: prāṇā ādyā yeṣāṃ vāyūnāṃ te prāṇādyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1192: yena kāye 'gnirdīpita āhāraṃ ca pacati sa samānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1194: yaḥ sarvaśarīraṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ sa vyānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1201: dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31jaymangu:1207: tathā hi cakṣuṣālocitaṃ buddhyādhyavasitamahaṅkāreṇātmīkṛtaṃ manasā saṅkalpitamiti //
GSP31jaymangu:1210: mandaprakāśe sthāṇupuruṣocitāmūrdhvatāṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ kiṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣa iti vikalpaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1214: thāvṛttiḥ sā kasmin viṣaya ityāha - 'dṛṣṭe'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1224: atha yadetaccatuṣṭayaṃ tatkiṃ yugapat parasparasavyapekṣaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛtiṃ pratipadyate kiṃ vā nirapekṣamityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1226: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31jaymangu:1231: tatra bhūtāṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ vṛttiṃ catvāri karaṇāni pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1233: evaṃ buddhirahaṅkāro manaśca trayāṇāmākūtaṃ jñātvā 'dhyavasāyamabhimānaṃ saṅkalpanaṃ ca pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1242: evaṃ bāhyānyapi karaṇāni svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ pratipadyante //
GSP31jaymangu:1243: etāni kimātmārthaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyante,
GSP31jaymangu:1248: sa eva buddhyādikalāpaṃ sṛṣṭavān yena puruṣasyārthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1252: pradhānavyatirekeṇa na kaścidbuddhyādikaraṇaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ kārayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1256: niścetanatvāt prakṛteḥ sacetano 'dhiṣṭhātā kartā 'paro gaveṣyata iti cet,
GSP31jaymangu:1276: tatra kasya kā kriyā yadapekṣayā karaṇamityāha- 'tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram'; /
GSP31jaymangu:1283: tatra śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañceti daśadhā /
GSP31jaymangu:1300: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1313: tenāntaḥkaraṇasya dvividho viṣayaḥ- dvāraṃ bhogyaṃ ceti /
GSP31jaymangu:1317: kalyata iti kālaḥ viṣaya evātīto 'nāgato vartamānoścocyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1320: tatra sāmprato vartamānaḥ kālo yasya bāhyasya taddhi bāhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1333: yathā ca mano vartamānaṃ saṅkalpayatīti tathātītānāgatāvapi /
GSP31jaymangu:1334: tatra kimidaṃ bhūtaṃ syāt, na mameti /
GSP31jaymangu:1339: nanu ca yadi sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayaste viśeṣāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1343: vāgbhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāṇi tu pañcaviṣayīṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31jaymangu:1345: teṣāmapi trayodaśānāṃ karaṇānāṃ yāni pañca buddhīndriyāṇi,
GSP31jaymangu:1347: śabdādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dvividhāḥ - viśeṣā aviśeṣāśca /
GSP31jaymangu:1351: ta eva viṣayā vidyante yeṣāmiti matvarthopaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1365: pāyurupasthaśca śabdādimadeva malaṃ śukraṃ ca visṛjati /
GSP31jaymangu:1366: anena dvāreṇa tu sarvaṃ bāhyaṃ karaṇaṃ pañcaviṣayameva draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1380: 'sarvam'; iti / triṣvapi kāleṣu vyavasthitaṃ viṣayamavagāhate gṛhṇāti yasmāt ,
GSP31jaymangu:1388: nanu ca yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ bāhyakaraṇadvāreṇa sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate,
GSP31jaymangu:1391: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31jaymangu:1392: 'ete'; ityādi / śrotrādayo vāgādayo buddhyādayaścetyete trayodaśa guṇaviśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1393: traya eva guṇā anyo 'nyābhibhavadvāreṇa pariṇatāḥ śrotrādivyapadeśabhāja ityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1398: na taditareṣāmapi yadi syādetenaiva viṣayāvagāhanaṃ siddhaṃ kimanyena //
GSP31jaymangu:1400: trailokyagataṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ sūkṣmasthūlaviṣayalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśyābhivyaktiṃ nītvā paścādahaṅkārādayo dvādaśa buddhau prayacchanti,
GSP31jaymangu:1403: tasyāṃ ca viṣayopadhānoparaktyāṃ buddhau puruṣa upalabhate /
GSP31jaymangu:1408: nanu ca tulye karaṇatve kimityahaṅkārādayo buddhau prayacchanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1411: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31jaymangu:1414: devamanuṣyatiryagyoniśu yo viṣayasyopabhogastaṃ prati sarvaṃ trailokyagataviṣayaṃ puruṣasya sādhayati,
GSP31jaymangu:1421: yadā tamasvatī buddhirbhavati tadā sarvamupanītaṃ sampādayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1449: te ca kiṃsvarūpā ityāha- 'śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1461: ye sūkṣmāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrasyāśrayatāṃ gatāste 'pi viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1470: yāni mahābhūtāni bāhyāni śāntaghoramūḍhānyuktāni tāni sthūlaśarīrasyāvakāśavyūhanapattikledanadhāraṇakartṛtvena prakṛṣṭabhūtānyucynte /
GSP31jaymangu:1505: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /
GSP31jaymangu:1513: tairvinā yathā cchāyā snigdhā paruṣā vā na tiṣṭhati //
GSP31jaymangu:1521: na ca nirādhāreṇa karaṇena puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1535: yathaika eva naṭastaṃ taṃ viśeṣamāsthāya yavanikānto nirgatya rājāmātyaviduṣakādibhāvenānuviddho 'vatiṣṭhate,
GSP31jaymangu:1536: tathā liṅgamapi taṃ taṃ dehamāsthāya devamanuṣyatiryagbhāvena vyavatiṣṭhate //
GSP31jaymangu:1542: kimetatsarvamīśvarāt kiṃ vā svabhāvādityatrāha- 'prakṛteḥ vibhutvayogāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1546: pradhānenaiva hi puruṣasyārthaḥ kartavya iti mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgamutpādya dharmādibhiradhivāsayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1562: yadāha- 'dharmādyā dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇāśrayiṇaḥ kāryāśrayiṇaśca kalalādyāḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1614: yo viṣayādidarśanādvirakto yamaniyamaparisthito na jñānaṃ paryeṣate,
GSP31jaymangu:1615: tasya mṛtasya vairāgyādaṣṭāsyu prakṛtiṣu pradhānāditanmātraparyantāsu layaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1617: tallīnaścātmānaṃ muktamiva manyate na tu muktam,
GSP31jaymangu:1619: yadā tu jñānaṃ paryeṣyate tadā mucyata eva /
GSP31jaymangu:1622: ityevaṃ jāyate mokṣo mukta ātmastha ucyate // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1635: eṣāmaṣṭānāṃ buddhirūpāṇāmekena mokṣaḥ saptabhirbandhaḥ saṃsāra iti yadetannimittanaimittikaṃ ṣoḍaśamuktaṃ tatsaṃkṣepeṇa caturvidhamāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1647: tasya catuvidhasya punaḥ pañcāśat bhedā bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1661: ajñānākhyasya sargasya bhedāḥ pañca- tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro 'ndhatāmisraśceti /
GSP31jaymangu:1669: tayorvaikalyādaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā yasyāḥ aśakteḥ sā bhavatīti vibhaktipariṇāmena yojyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1689: tataśca teṣāmaṣṭāsveva prakṛtiṣu layo bhavatīti aṣṭavidhā avidyā,
GSP31jaymangu:1699: sa ca divyādivyaviṣayeṣu vartamāno daśavidho bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1706: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1710: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1714: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe viṣaya eva bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1737: te kiyanta ityāha- 'saptadaśadhā ca buddhervupayayāstuṣṭisiddhīnām'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1756: saiva vyaktātmanā pariṇamya bandhamokṣau kuruta ityetāvanmātropadeśāt tuṣṭo bhavati yastasya prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭirambha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1761: ityasmādadvitīyādupadeśādihaiva muktiḥ prāptavyeti parituṣṭaḥ pravrajito 'yaṃ tasya dvitīyā upādānākhyā tuṣṭiḥ salilamucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1763_0: mahadādisūkṣmaparyantena liṅgena saṃsaratā 'pareṇa mokṣo na prakṛtyupādānamātrādihaiva
GSP31jaymangu:1763_1: janmanīti tasmāttṛtīyādupadeśāt tuṣṭo yaḥ kālāpekṣī sthitastasya kālākhyā tuṣṭirodha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1766: kaścidviparītabhāgadheyo 'stīti tasmāccaturthādupadeśāt tuṣṭo yo bhāgyāpekṣī sthitastasya caturthī vṛṣṭirityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1767: etāścatasra ātmānamadhikṛtya bhavantītyādhyātmikāḥ ātmanā moktavyamiti kṛtvā //
GSP31jaymangu:1771: tatra viṣayārjane mahadduḥkhaṃ tadalpaviṣayebhya ityārjanadoṣadarśanānnivṛttasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ pañcamī sutāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1775: viṣayā ārjituṃ rakṣituṃ kṣaye ca pratividhātuṃ śakyāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1777: tadaprāptau ca mahadduḥkhamiti saṅgadoṣadarśanāduparastasyāṣṭamī tuṣṭiranuttamāmbha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1778: sarvaṃ śakyaṃ kintvanupahatya bhūtāni na bhogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1779: bhūtopaghātānmahadaniṣṭaphalamiti hiṃsādoṣadarśanāduparatasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ navamī uttamāmbha ityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1783: tatra prakṛtyupādānakālā na mokṣopāyā ityupadiṣṭamapi yo vaimukhyānna pratipadyate tasyādhyātmikāścatasraḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1800: janmāntarasaṃskṛtadhiyo yasya bandhamokṣakāraṇamutprekṣamāṇasya pradhānapuruṣāntarajñānamutpadyate tasya siddhirūhahetukā prathamā tāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1812: pūrvā yāstisraḥ siddhyayastā na duḥkhahetukā iti boddhavyāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1823: yaḥ śakto 'pi sāṃkhyaśāstraṃ śṛṇvannapi buddhidaurbalyānna buddhyati tasya śabdahetukā asiddhiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1825: yasya gurupūrvakaṃ nādhyayanaṃ buddhidoṣādeva tasyānadhyayanahetukā asiddhiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1826: na yatra mitrasaṃgraho na ca dānamityaṣṭāvasiddhayo buddhivadhā aśaktāvantarbhūtāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1830: tasyā aṣṭavidhāyāḥ siddheryaḥ pūrvo viparyayāśaktituṣṭyākhyastrividha uktaḥ so 'ṅkuśa ivetyaṅkuśa uktaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1832: tatra viparyayādiṣyate bandha iti vacanāt pañcavidhamajñānamaṅkuśaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1837: viṣayoparamācca mukta ityetāvanmātrādupadeśāt tuṣṭo na jñānaṃ paryeṣyati /
GSP31jaymangu:1844: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1856: tatra kiṃ bhāvā api pūrvamutpannāḥ kiṃ liṅgamevetyatrāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1861: yadi bhāvā na pūrvotpannāstairvinā liṅgamapi nāsti /
GSP31jaymangu:1866: yasmādevaṃ tasmāt liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyaśca dviprakāraḥ pradhānatvāt sargo bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1871: yathā dvāvetau pūrvotpannau tatha bhūtasargo 'pīti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1910: sthūlaśarīre sattvayi kaścideva kvacidadhikyena vartata iti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1931: tadeva tarhi sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpnoti,
GSP31jaymangu:1933: tatra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1941: tatra mātuḥ kukṣau andhatamasīva praviṣṭasya saṅkucanaprasāraṇaduḥkhaṃ garbhaduḥkham /
GSP31jaymangu:1945: etattvādhyātmikaṃ duḥkhe 'ntarbhūtamaprītaduḥkhaṃ buddhyādhyavasitaṃ puruṣaḥ prāpnoti tasya cetanatvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:1960: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā /
GSP31jaymangu:1963: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1966: svabhāvikamevedaṃ sarvaṃ jagannahi marudādayaḥ kenacit kriyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1969: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31jaymangu:1989: tathāhi mokṣārthaṃ viṣayopabhogārthaṃ cāyamārambha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1995: yaḥ kaścit devadattasvārtha eva parārtho rahititaṃ pravartate na parastapastakaroti (?)
GSP31jaymangu:2001: pradhānasyācetanatvātkathaṃ lokatraye puruṣaṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyojya dhyānena vipramocya nivarteta /
GSP31jaymangu:2022: madhvarthaṃ prasthitaḥ kaścid grāmābhyāśe tu mākṣikam /
GSP31jaymangu:2023: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:2029: tadvat pralayāvasthāyāṃ puruṣo 'pi mokṣanimittaṃ yadautsukyaṃ tannivṛttaye pravartayetpradhānamiti // 58 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2034: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate narttakī yathā nṛttāt /
GSP31jaymangu:2039: sā tathā raṅgasya nṛttaṃ darśayitvā tasmānnṛttānnivartate viramati,
GSP31jaymangu:2041: tathā puruṣasyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśya devādibhāvarūpaṃ gatā nivartate prakṛtiḥ pradhānamityarthaḥ // 59 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2045: nanu ca naṭī raṅgāt svārthaṃ sādhayati,
GSP31jaymangu:2061: tasya puṃso 'rtho dvividhaḥ- viṣayopabhogaḥ kaivalyaṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:2075: yattu dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ tanmāyāvastu tucchakam // iti / atrāha -
GSP31jaymangu:2076: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:2077: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31jaymangu:2080: etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāgvyaktātmanā prakāśayati na tvavyaktātmanāpi,
GSP31jaymangu:2081: yena jñānāvasthāyāṃ prakṛtermatirbhavati mama sūkṣmataraṃ na kiñcidaparamasti yaddraṣṭavyaṃ puruṣeṇa //
GSP31jaymangu:2091: tasmānna puruṣasya bandho nāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ mokṣo vetyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:2092: tasmānna badhyate 'ddhā na mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31jaymangu:2093: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31jaymangu:2100: kasya tarhi bandhādaya ityāha- saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca prakṛtiriti /
GSP31jaymangu:2101: nanu ca tasyāḥ sukumāratvādbandhādayo na sambhavantyevetyatrāha- nānāśrayeṣurabhivajyate (?) /
GSP31jaymangu:2114: saivātmanaiva puruṣārthaṃ pratyātmānaṃ mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31jaymangu:2124: yaṃ puruṣamapekṣya jñānamutpādayati taṃ pratyavyaktamātmānaṃ saṃharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:2140: yadetat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ bhautikaṃ ca tasminna bhavāmi,
GSP31jaymangu:2153: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31jaymangu:2155: yat prakṛtijñānamutpadyate taṃ prati nivṛtaḥ prasavo liṅgabhūtasargākhyo yasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sa tathoktā /
GSP31jaymangu:2156: prasavanivṛttyā vā yo viṣayo viṣayebhyo nivartate tadvaśāt,
GSP31jaymangu:2161: yathā prekṣakaḥ pravarttitanṛttamupasaṃhṛtanṛttāṃ ca narttakīṃ paśyati,
GSP31jaymangu:2169: nanu ca yadi prakṛtirgarbhabhūḥpuruṣaṃ prati nivṛttaprasavā,
GSP31jaymangu:2170: tasyāśca prakṛtestadānīṃ sarvagatatvādastyeva saṃyogastatkimiti punaḥ śarīrotpattirna bhavatītyāha -
GSP31jaymangu:2172: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31jaymangu:2180: tataśca saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya /
GSP31jaymangu:2201: yathā kulālavyāpāre nivṛtte 'pi vegavaśāt kiyantamapi kālaṃ cakrabhramastiṣṭhati tathā śarīramapītyarthaḥ // 67 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2209: liṅgabhautikaśarīre pṛthagbhūte yathā saṃbhūte layaṃ gati teṣvityarthaḥ (?) //
GSP31jaymangu:2215: satyapi tayoḥ saṃyoge prayojanābhāvānna punaḥ sarga ityātyantikamiti // 68 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2231: yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ sthityādayo vyavasthāpyante /
GSP31jaymangu:2233: sā ca triṣu sthāneṣu daivamānuṣatairyagyoneṣu utpattiḥ sṛṣṭapradhānāt yāvat tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni /
GSP31jaymangu:2244: tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31jaymangu:2251: tatra jñānākhyena bhāvenāndhe tamasi vartamānaṃ jagat dṛṣṭavato muneḥ karuṇotpannā /
GSP31jaymangu:2252: tayā ca preryamāṇa āsuriṃ sagotrabrāhmaṇaṃ varṣasahasrayātinamāgatyovāca /
GSP31jaymangu:2260: sa tu pradipadya gṛhasthadharmaṃ tyaktvā pravrajitaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:2266: āsurirapi tadeva saṃkṣiptaṃ pañcaśikhāya svaśiṣyāyānukampayā pradadau //
GSP31jaymangu:2267: 'tena'; iti / pañcaśikhena muninā bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram /
GSP31jaymangu:2273: nanu ca ṣaṣṭitantramevāstu kiṃ saptatyeti svaśāstrakaraṇaprayojanamāha-
GSP31jaymangu:2298: ityādinā granthena ya uktāste kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasyāpi //
GSP31jaymangu:2304: paraṃ bandhamokṣopayogino 'rthāḥ darśitā iti tasmāt sampūrṇeyaṃ saptatiriti // 72 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
